participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, Jake enjoys exploring nature and getting lost in music.
participant_1.background: I am a guy that enjoys being a guy. I like to hike and spend time outdoors. My favorite thing to eat is a burrito. I am close to my mother, but not to my father.

participant_2.name: Emma Rodriguez
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Emma loves expressing herself through music and film.
participant_2.background: I enjoy John Gresham movies, but not his books. My parents used to work in politics, until they discovered the goodness within themselves. I do not like wearing pants when I do not have to. I am a really, really good guitar player. My girlfriend tells me she is going to leave me almost every day.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
It's going well, thanks for asking!
What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out and playing guitar.
Nice! I love playing guitar too. What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different genres, but I mostly play rock and blues.
That's awesome! I love rock and blues too.
Yeah, it's great music.
What's your favorite John Gresham movie?
Oh, that's a tough one. I think I'd have to say "The Narrow Door."
Oh, I love that movie! It's so sad, but so beautiful.
Yeah, it's definitely one of my favorites.
What's your favorite thing about it?
I think I just love the story and the characters. It's so well-written and acted.
Yeah, I agree. It's a really great movie.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike, play guitar, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
Awesome! We should hang out sometime.
That sounds like a great idea!
Great! I'll text you my number.
